thread.title: Freezing 'wacky' weather could become more frequent event

title: Freezing 'wacky' weather could become more frequent event
text:
Freezing 'wacky' weather could become more frequent event 11:15am EST - 01:37 
The 'wacky' weather freezing western Europe could become a more frequent event according to climate scientists studying the polar regions, as Stuart McDill reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The 'wacky' weather freezing western Europe could become a more frequent event according to climate scientists studying the polar regions, as Stuart McDill reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2HYhQi5
